data.name: Appraisal_Bag_Empty
data.value: What?[pause=0] You don't have any items,[pause=10] let alone any boxes.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose
data.value: Pick the box you want opened. (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_Multi
data.value: I can crack them all open for [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_One
data.value: I can crack open that {1} for [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024.

data.name: Appraisal_End
data.value: There ya go.[pause=0] Check out the loot!

data.name: Appraisal_Goodbye
data.value: Come back if you got any more locks that need picking!

data.name: Appraisal_Info_001
data.value: I'm sure you've...[pause=20] "come across" some boxes in your travels, yea?

data.name: Appraisal_Info_002
data.value: And while your skillset may include fighting,[pause=10] it doesn't include lockpicking,[pause=10] right?

data.name: Appraisal_Info_003
data.value: That's where me and my claws come in.

data.name: Appraisal_Info_004
data.value: I'll open any box you bring me and give ya the contents,[pause=10] just [color=#00FFFF]150[color] \uE024 each for my troubles.

data.name: Appraisal_Intro
data.value: Got any boxes you need opened? Just [color=#00FFFF]150[color] \uE024 each.

data.name: Appraisal_No_Money
data.value: This ain't a charity service.[pause=0] Either get some \uE024 or don't come back!

data.name: Appraisal_Option_Open
data.value: Open Boxes

data.name: Appraisal_Return
data.value: Anything else you need?

data.name: Appraisal_Start
data.value: This'll only take a moment.

data.name: NPC_Aggron_1
data.value: Hmm...[pause=0] I could have sworn the dojo was supposed to be around here...

data.name: NPC_Aggron_2
data.value: Excuse me,[pause=10] do you know where the Ledian Dojo is located?[pause=0] I can't seem to find it.

data.name: NPC_Aggron_3
data.value: Ah,[pause=10] thank you young ones,[pause=10] that makes more sense.

data.name: NPC_Aggron_4
data.value: Perhaps I will see you youngsters training there in the future!

data.name: NPC_Aggron_Response_1
data.value: Ledian Dojo?[pause=0] That's south of here.[pause=0] When you see a Slowpoke hut,[pause=10]

data.name: NPC_Aggron_Response_2
data.value: go west a bit,[pause=10] and you should see the staircase to the dojo.

data.name: NPC_Cacnea_1
data.value: poop

data.name: NPC_Electrike_1
data.value: Hey, you two are leaving for your expedition today,[pause=10] right?

data.name: NPC_Electrike_2
data.value: Please take me with you,[pause=10] I can't take these two anymore.

data.name: NPC_Emote_Test_1
data.value: I am now going to do every emotion portrait I possibly can.

data.name: NPC_Emote_Test_2
data.value: poop

data.name: NPC_Furret_1
data.value: Ah...[pause=0] This is my favorite place to snooze \u266A

data.name: NPC_Glameow_1
data.value: diapers

data.name: NPC_Luxio_1
data.value: [player],[pause=10] [partner].[pause=0] You guys are leaving on the guild expedition today,[pause=10] right?

data.name: NPC_Luxio_2
data.value: You're lucky to be in the guild.[pause=0] Team Style just works with the guild,[pause=10] so we aren't allowed to go on it.

data.name: NPC_Luxio_3
data.value: I have to admit,[pause=10] I'm a little jealous.[pause=0] Ah well,[pause=10] good luck to you both.

data.name: NPC_Magby_1
data.value: Haha,[pause=10] you're gonna be it,[pause=10] [oddish]!

data.name: NPC_Meditite_2
data.value: ...ZZZzzz...

data.name: NPC_Meditite_3
data.value: (It looks as though they've fallen asleep while meditating.)

data.name: NPC_Oddish_1
data.value: Careful [magby]!![pause=0] You're gonna burn my hair again!

data.name: NPC_Squirtle_1
data.value: Hey, have either of you two seen Ana anywhere?[pause=0] She wasn't around today when I woke up.

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_1
data.value: What do you want to do today,[pause=10] Dun?

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_2
data.value: I don't know,[pause=10] what do you want to do today,[pause=10] Dee?

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_3
data.value: I don't know,[pause=10] what do you want to do today,[pause=10] Dun?

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_4
data.value: I don't know,[pause=10] what do-

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_5
data.value: Will you two PLEASE STOP.

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_6
data.value: We will never figure out what we're doing today if you two keep going back and forth like that!

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_7
data.value: I just wanna know what Dun wants to do today!

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_8
data.value: And I just wanna know what Dee wants to today!

data.name: NPC_Woopers_Intro_9
data.value: Ugh...

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] You have no items to sell!

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Oh![pause=0] You have no space for my wares!

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Very well! Feel free to examine my merchandise! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Thank you! It's all yours! \u266a

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: I'm all sold out![pause=0] Please forgive me.[pause=0] Come see me tomorrow! \u266a

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that comes to [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024. Is that OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: What?[pause=0] You don't seem to have the funds.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Thanks! Please come again! \u266A

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: This is the Kecleon Shop,[pause=10] ran by my brother and I.

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: The items I sell are useful for dungeon expeditions![pause=0] You should always be prepared when exploring! \u266a

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: We restock our wares daily,[pause=10] so come check our wares each and every day!

data.name: Shop_Info_004
data.value: We even have markets inside of some mystery dungeons,[pause=10] so you can visit us anywhere! \u266a

data.name: Shop_Info_005
data.value: After all,[pause=10] it is the job of us salesmen to bring the goods you need no matter where you are! \u266a

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Hello! \u266A \n Welcome to the Kecleon Shop! \u266A

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Very well! What will you sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024 for everything. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can pay [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024 for that {1}. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Success
data.value: Ok... {0} forgot {1}...

data.name: Tutor_Forget_What
data.value: Uh... What move is {0} forgetting...?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Who
data.value: Uh... Who do I need to help forget a move...?

data.name: Tutor_Goodbye
data.value: We're done...? Come again if you need help with moves...

data.name: Tutor_Info_001
data.value: Uh...[pause=0] Forgotten things you need to know...[pause=0] Like I often do...?

data.name: Tutor_Info_002
data.value: For no cost at all, I can remind you of any level-up move you've forgotten...

data.name: Tutor_Info_003
data.value: I can also help you forget moves...[pause=0] I'm pretty good at forgetting, after all...

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: Hey... Need to relearn any moves...? Or maybe you need to forget some...?

data.name: Test_Free_Items
data.value: Ho ho ho, have some items.[pause=0] Debug, and all that.

data.name: Tutor_Cant_Forget
data.value: Hey...[pause=0] {0} has no moves to forget...

data.name: Tutor_Cant_Remember
data.value: Hey...[pause=0] {0} has no moves to remember...

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Begin
data.value: Ok... Let me see now...

data.name: Tutor_Intro_Return
data.value: Uh... Was there anything else...?

data.name: Tutor_No_Money
data.value: Hey...[pause=0] You don't have enough \uE024...

data.name: Tutor_Option_Tutor
data.value: Tutor

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Begin
data.value: Ok... What was that move like again...?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Replace
data.value: Uh... {0} has too many moves...[pause=0]\nPick one to replace...

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Success
data.value: Ok... {0} learned how to use {1} again...

data.name: Tutor_Remember_What
data.value: Uh... What move did {0} want to remember again...?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Who
data.value: Uh... Who's remembering a move now...?

data.name: Music_Intro
data.value: Hello there! \u266A\nFancy a music change?

data.name: Music_End
data.value: Speak with me anytime you'd like a change in music! \u266A

data.name: Sign_Guild_Bridge_1
data.value: North: Adventurer's Guild\nEast: Marketplace

data.name: Sign_Crossroads_1
data.value: Metano Town\nThe ever-evolving village

data.name: Sign_Crossroads_2
data.value: North: Housing\nEast: Adventurer's Guild, Marketplace

data.name: Sign_Crossroads_3
data.value: South: Altere Pond

data.name: Sign_Dojo_1
data.value: Train your body, mind, and soul! Ledian Dojo

data.name: Sign_To_Dungeons_1
data.value: East: Exploration

data.name: Sign_Wishing_Well_1
data.value: Metano Town Wishing Well\nToss in a \uE024 and make a wish!

data.name: Sign_To_Spring_1
data.value: North: Luminous Spring

data.name: Swap_Info_001
data.value: I'm a treasure collector,[pause=10] and I'm always looking for new treasures,[pause=10] ook.

data.name: Test_Intro_Cutscene
data.value: Here's what the intro cutscene looks like...

data.name: Swap_Choose
data.value: Here are today's swap offers,[pause=10] ook.

data.name: Swap_Complete_001
data.value: I'll take your items into my tails,[pause=10] ook!

data.name: Swap_Complete_002
data.value: And here's my end of the bargain,[pause=10] ook.

data.name: Swap_Confirm_001
data.value: That'll be your {0} for my {1},[pause=10] ook.

data.name: Swap_Confirm_002
data.value: This trade will cost [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024. [pause=0] is that okay,[pause=10] ook?

data.name: Swap_Give
data.value: {0} accepted the {1}!

data.name: Swap_Give_Choose
data.value: A {0}?[pause=0] What will you swap for me in exchange,[pause=10] ook?

data.name: Swap_Goodbye
data.value: Come back again whenever you want to swap,[pause=10] ook!

data.name: Swap_Info_002
data.value: I'm willing to part with some of my collection, in exchange for some of your own treasures,[pause=10] ook.

data.name: Swap_Info_003
data.value: The treasures I offer change with each day,[pause=10] so come see me often,[pause=10] ook!

data.name: Swap_Intro
data.value: Welcome to the Swap Shop.[pause=10] Got any treasures to swap,[pause=10] ook?

data.name: Swap_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything else,[pause=10] ook?

data.name: Swap_Option_Swap
data.value: Swap

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_1
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] I just love the Metano Market![pause=0] There are so many vendors to see \u266A

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_2
data.value: My favorite place...[pause=0] Dion's Café has lots of tasty treats and Pokémon to meet!

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_3
data.value: There's the local Kecleon's shop.[pause=0] Those two buy and sell all sorts of useful items!

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_4
data.value: Over here is Mama (kanga name)'s storage.[pause=0] She can safeguard your items for you.

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_5
data.value: Right here is (murkrow name)'s Bank.[pause=0] He will watch over your money and keep it safe.

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_6
data.value: Over there is (sneasel)'s stand...[pause=0] He's shady if you ask me,[pause=10] but he can open any lock.

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_7
data.value: That's (slowpoke).[pause=0] He can help you remember or forget moves.

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_8
data.value: And there's (ambi)'s Swap Shop.[pause=0] He's the Pokémon to talk to for Exclusive items.

data.name: NPC_Delcatty_9
data.value: There are some other services around town,[pause=10] so be sure to explore!

data.name: NPC_Psyduck_1
data.value: There are so many choices on this menu...

data.name: NPC_Psyduck_2
data.value: It's giving me a headache.

data.name: NPC_Munchlax_1
data.value: Dion's Cafe has a different special everyday.

data.name: NPC_Munchlax_2
data.value: My favorite is the White Gummi.[pause=0] I wish they were always available.

data.name: NPC_Lickitung_1
data.value: Me and (munchlax) like to come to Dion's often.[pause=0] He loves the food but...

data.name: NPC_Lickitung_2
data.value: My tongue's so long that it touches the ground.[pause=0] All I can taste is dirt.

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_1
data.value: Let's see...[pause=0] Apples...[pause=0] Leppas...[pause=0] Orans...

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_2
data.value: I think that's everything I needed![pause=0] Thank you (kecleon).

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_3
data.value: No,[pause=10] thank you for your kind patronage,[pause=10] my dear (manetric) \u266A

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_4
data.value: Until next time,[pause=10] (kecleon).

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_5
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] pardon me.[pause=0] Are you here to shop,[pause=10] too?

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_6
data.value: The Kecleon Brothers are a wonderful bunch.[pause=0] I do all my family's grocery shopping with them.

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_7
data.value: I'll be on my way home now.[pause=0] See you later!

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_8
data.value: Ah,[pause=10] that (manetric) is one of our most valued customers...

data.name: NPC_Shop_Intro_9
data.value: Anyway...[pause=0] You two are here to shop,[pause=10] yes?

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_1
data.value: Welp,[pause=10] tomorrow's the big day.[pause=0] The expedition...

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_2
data.value: I'm excited for it and all,[pause=10] but I have butterflies in my stomach too.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_3
data.value: We've only been a team for a few months now,[pause=10] so the guild allowing us to come is surprising.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_4
data.value: They usually don't invite rookies to go on expeditions.[pause=0] I guess I'm worried about living up to expectations.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_5
data.value: Maybe I'm just thinking about it too much though.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_6
data.value: If Trevion has faith in us,[pause=10] then I think we'll do just fine.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_7
data.value: Anyways... Like (noctowl) said,[pause=10] we'll need to be prepared for a long journey.

data.name: Cutscene_Intro_Partner_8
data.value: Let's go into town and get everything we need.[pause=0] We should see what we have in storage before we shop.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Intro
data.value: Welcome to {0}'s Wares, what can I do for you?

data.name: Red_Merchant_Intro_Return_Happy
data.value: Anything else I can do for you two?

data.name: Red_Merchant_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else?

data.name: Red_Merchant_Intro_Happy
data.value: Hey hey! Welcome back to {0}'s Wares!

data.name: Red_Merchant_Intro_Angry
data.value: What do YOU two want?

data.name: Red_Merchant_No_Stock
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] you've cleaned out today's stock.[pause=0] Come again tomorrow.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Refuse_Service
data.value: You chose {0}'s overpriced junk over my well-priced wares.[pause=0] Get lost.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Daily_Item
data.value: Today's item is {2} {0} and it'll set you back [color=#00FFFF]{1}[color] \uE024, that alright with you?

data.name: Red_Merchant_No_Money
data.value: Hey,[pause=10] looks like you don't have the cash to buy my wares.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Bag_Full
data.value: Hey,[pause=10] looks like your bag is full.[pause=0] Come back after you've made space.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Purchase_Made
data.value: Thank you for your purchase![pause=0] I know you'd choose my wares!

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Angry
data.value: I'm not telling you anything,[pause=10] I saw you buy {0}'s junk.[pause=0] Get out of my sight.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_1
data.value: Here at {0}'s,[pause=10] I sell useful items for adventurers like you two each day.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_2
data.value: My stocks are more limited that I would like to admit,[pause=10] so I only sell one item per day.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_3
data.value: However,[pause=10] you'll get that item for much cheaper than if you had gone to the Kecleon Shop to buy it.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_4
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] but if I see you buying from that snob {0},[pause=10] you can forget doing business with me.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_5
data.value: I don't wanna see your faces again if I catch you doing that!

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Happy_1
data.value: As you already know,[pause=10] I sell wonderful items here each day.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Happy_2
data.value: You bought all of my stock today,[pause=10] but I'll have more tomorrow,[pause=10] valued shoppers!

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Happy_3
data.value: If only I could sell more than one item per day to clients like you...

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Happy_4
data.value: You knew a good deal when you saw it,[pause=10] which is why you came to me and not that snoot {0}.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Info_Happy_5
data.value: If you buy from him,[pause=10] you can forget about buying anything from me.[pause=0] But that won't happen,[pause=10] right?

data.name: Red_Merchant_Goodbye_Angry
data.value: Yeah,[pause=10] you better leave if you know what's good for you.

data.name: Red_Merchant_Goodbye_Happy
data.value: Until next time![pause=0] Hope to do business with you again tomorrow!

data.name: Red_Merchant_Goodbye
data.value: Come back soon!

data.name: Merchant_Option_Deal
data.value: Deal

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: {2} {1}? That will be [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024.

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: A done deal! \u266A\n Thank you \u266A

data.name: Green_Merchant_Intro
data.value: Welcome to {0}'s Curios, where wonderous equipment is found!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Intro_Return_Happy
data.value: How else may I be of service, my valued customers?

data.name: Green_Merchant_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything else today, my friends?

data.name: Green_Merchant_Intro_Happy
data.value: Ah, welcome, my valued customers, to {0}'s Curios! How may I be of service to you?

data.name: Green_Merchant_Intro_Angry
data.value: You dare show your faces to me!?

data.name: Green_Merchant_No_Stock
data.value: Apologies,[pause=10] but I have nothing else for purchase today.[pause=0] Visit again tomorrow for more of my fine wares!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Refuse_Service
data.value: You have the gall to try to purchase my wares after consorting with that fiend over there!?[pause=0] Away with you!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Daily_Item
data.value: For sale today, I have {2} {0}.\nIt costs [color=#00FFFF]{1}[color] \uE024, is that acceptable?

data.name: Green_Merchant_No_Money
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] my friends,[pause=10] but you don't have enough money!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Bag_Full
data.value: Sorry,[pause=10] my friends,[pause=10] but your bag is full!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Purchase_Made
data.value: Thank you for your business,[pause=10] my esteemed patrons![pause=0]\nI knew you would make the right choice!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Angry
data.value: Why not go ask {0} about his "great" deals,[pause=10] hmm!?

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Happy_1
data.value: As you may already know,[pause=10] esteemed patrons,[pause=10] I sell a rare held item here daily.

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Happy_2
data.value: Being so rare,[pause=10] I regret to say I can only sell you one item a day,[pause=10] so visit each day to check my stock.

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Happy_3
data.value: Much of my stock cannot be found elsewhere,[pause=10] and so is worth every \uE024!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Happy_4
data.value: I am pleased to see that you have the smarts to patronize my business rather than that crook's over there.

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_Happy_5
data.value: I would not like to think about the words I would say to those who choose his garbage over my fine goods.

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_1
data.value: I,[pause=10] {0},[pause=10] sell a different held item here each day.

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_2
data.value: Due to the rare nature of my items,[pause=10] I only have one item in stock per day.[pause=0] Visit often to see what I carry!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_3
data.value: Many of my items cannot be found anywhere else,[pause=10] and are well worth their weight in \uE024!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_4
data.value: I trust that you will buy from me and not that charlatan {0}...

data.name: Green_Merchant_Info_5
data.value: If you buy anything from him,[pause=10] you can forget getting any of my precious equipment!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Goodbye_Angry
data.value: Feh! Tasteless heathens...

data.name: Green_Merchant_Goodbye_Happy
data.value: Until next time, my valued customers!

data.name: Green_Merchant_Goodbye
data.value: Until next time, my friends!

data.name: test
data.value: test

data.name: Storage_Intro
data.value: Hello, dear! Welcome to Kangaskhan Storage.

data.name: Storage_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else, sweetie?

data.name: Storage_Store
data.value: What items would you like to store?\n (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Storage_Stored_Items
data.value: Stored away! Your items are safe with me, dearie.

data.name: Storage_Withdraw
data.value: What items would you like to take out?\n (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Storage_Withdrew_Items
data.value: Here you are, dearie!

data.name: Storage_Info_1
data.value: I can safeguard any items you just can't bear to lose.

data.name: Storage_Info_2
data.value: When you faint in dungeons,[pause=10] most of your items will be lost...

data.name: Storage_Info_3
data.value: But items you keep with me will be safe![pause=0] Nothing gets past this momma's watchful eye!

data.name: Storage_Info_4
data.value: You can come see me anytime you want to take items out of storage.

data.name: Storage_Info_5
data.value: If you find a Storage Box out in the field,[pause=10] you can access my storage with those as well.

data.name: Storage_Goodbye
data.value: Thanks, sweetie! Come again!

data.name: Bank_Intro
data.value: Welcome to Krow Bank...\nYour balance is [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024, how can I serve you today?

data.name: Bank_Intro_Return
data.value: Will there be anything else today?

data.name: Bank_Interact
data.value: Allow me to open up your account...

data.name: Bank_Stored_Money
data.value: Yes,[pause=10] [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024...[pause=0] Come to me,[pause=10] my shinies!

data.name: Bank_Withdrew_Money
data.value: [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024 for you...[pause=0] Goodbye,[pause=10] my precious shinies...

data.name: Bank_Canceled
data.value: No transaction then?[pause=0] Very well.

data.name: Bank_Info_1
data.value: When you fall in dungeons,[pause=10] most of your money will be lost forever...

data.name: Bank_Info_2
data.value: You can avoid that tragedy by leaving it with me instead.

data.name: Bank_Info_3
data.value: I'll hold onto your money,[pause=10] so even if you are defeated in a dungeon,[pause=10] it will be safe with me.

data.name: Bank_Info_4
data.value: You can use Storage Boxes in the field as well to access your bank account.

data.name: Bank_Goodbye
data.value: Until next time...

data.name: TM_Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] You have nothing to sell me!

data.name: TM_Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] You have no room for my wares!

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy
data.value: Very well! Feel free to examine my merchandise! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Thank you! It's all yours, my friends! \u266a

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: I'm all sold out![pause=0] Forgive me my friends.[pause=0] Come back tomorrow! \u266a

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that will cost you [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024. Is that acceptable?

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: What?[pause=0] You don't have enough money.

data.name: TM_Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Thank you friends! Please come again \u266a

data.name: TM_Shop_Info_001
data.value: Pokémon moves...[pause=0] They are beautiful![pause=0] Powerful![pause=0] Elegant![pause=0] Each so amazing in their own way!

data.name: TM_Shop_Info_002
data.value: I sell Technical Machines,[pause=10] or TMs for short,[pause=10] that will teach you new moves!

data.name: TM_Shop_Info_003
data.value: Punch![pause=0] Breathe fire![pause=0] Quake the earth itself![pause=0] Moves allow you to do so much!

data.name: TM_Shop_Info_004
data.value: I also sell Wands and Orbs that allow you to manipulate your foes and yourselves in many clever ways!

data.name: TM_Shop_Info_005
data.value: So friends, please![pause=0] Shop with us![pause=0] My brother and I are waiting here for you! \u266a

data.name: TM_Shop_Intro
data.value: Hello friends, and welcome to Kecleon Wares, where you can find Orbs, Wands, and TMs!

data.name: TM_Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything else I can assist you with?

data.name: TM_Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: TM_Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: TM_Shop_Sell
data.value: Very well! What will you sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: TM_Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024 for all of that. Is that acceptable?

data.name: TM_Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024 for that {1}. Is that acceptable?

data.name: TM_Shop_Buy_One
data.value: {2} {1} will cost you [color=#00FFFF]{0}[color] \uE024.

data.name: TM_Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Another closed sale! \u266a Thank you my friends! \u266a

data.name: Assembly_Intro
data.value: Welcome to the [color=#00FF00]Audino[color] Assembly!

data.name: Assembly_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything e-else I can help with?

data.name: Assembly_Goodbye
data.value: So long! Good luck w-with your adventures!

data.name: Assembly_Option_Members
data.value: Members

data.name: Assembly_Members_Shuffled
data.value: Just shuffling party order around?[pause=0] No problem!

data.name: Assembly_Leader_Changed
data.value: {0}{1} will become the leader of the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Members_Added
data.value: {0}{1} will be added to the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Members_Removed
data.value: {0}{1} will be removed from the party{2}

data.name: Assembly_Make_Changes
data.value: Alright! With a ring of this bell I'll change your party accordingly!

data.name: Assembly_Make_Changes_Done
data.value: All done!

data.name: Assembly_Info_001
data.value: I'm s-sure you've wanted to have other Pokémon besides the two of you on adventures,[pause=10] right?

data.name: Assembly_Info_002
data.value: With my assembly,[pause=10] you can add or remove anyone you have recruited with Apricorns to your team for adventures!

data.name: Assembly_Info_003
data.value: Any team members you choose for an adventure will wait at the café for you!

data.name: Assembly_Info_004
data.value: Of course,[pause=10] you two will always be on the active team.[pause=0] You wouldn't want to miss out on any adventures,[pause=10] r-right?

data.name: Assembly_Info_005
data.value: Just know that sometimes only the two of you will be allowed on an adventure!

data.name: Assembly_Info_006
data.value: By the way,[pause=10] Pokémon names colored like [color=#00FF00]this[color] instead of [color=#00FFFF]this[color] are species you've already recruited!

data.name: Assembly_Info_007
data.value: Oh,[pause=10] one more thing![pause=0] You can also ring the signpost by the café to call me to use the assembly!

data.name: Assembly_Info_008
data.value: My e-ears are really sensitive,[pause=10] so I'll hear the bell and come running!

data.name: Storage_Stored_All_Items
data.value: All your unequipped items are stored away! They're safe with me, dearie.
